reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is just across the road from Cabot Circus which is great after a full day on your feet. Our room was clean & very spacious with lovely comfortable beds. We stayed bed & breakfast. The breakfast was fine& you had as much as you wanted. The staff were all very polite & friendly.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel for shopping

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Something I was really impressed by was the large draws in the room, you could actually use them to put your clothes in!
reviews.title: Wedding Party..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would stay there again.
reviews.title: very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We attended a wedding party on Saturday 16th of June - the function room was great - the buffet was amazing - the bar staff were very friendly and efficient. we had a room booked to stay over night and the room was very comfy and met our needs totally - breakfast was great and our stay of twenty four hours were made very enjoyable by the very friendly and helpful Hotel Staff - would most certainly recommend to anyone that it's worth a stay -
reviews.title: Very good place, centrally located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location, easy to find (just off the motorway) and free safe car parking. Staff are friendly and helpful, free internet in lobby. Rooms large with huge comfortable beds. Loads of places within 2 minutes walk for breakfast just across the road in Cabot Circus.
reviews.title: Stayed overnight before Bristol airport flight in morning

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We spent two night at the hotel on a birthday weekend.
reviews.title: Great weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: We found the hotel great value for money with breakfast and parking included.
reviews.title: Satisfactory

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is opposite the shopping centre and is in an excellent location so walking everyone is not a problem.
reviews.title: Good for Shopping Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012
reviews.text: The staff were friendly and were very helpful. I needed a map printed for finding all the street art and it was not a problem.
reviews.title: Nice hotel would stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall a clean, great value and great location.
reviews.title: Would be 5 stars with better bed linen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed at this hotel quite a few times now and have never been disappointed.
reviews.title: Perfect again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Rooms are comfortable and clean, and very good soundproofing. The room we had this time was right beside the lift, so prepared for a disturbed stay. No problem whatsoever though. Hardly heard a thing.
reviews.title: If this is the future I want no part of it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were pleasant and welcoming. The lady who cleaned the room always had a friendly smile and "good morning".
reviews.title: Good AGAIN

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel - there won't be a third.
reviews.title: Re: 3rd stay at the Future Inn, Bristol

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Same issues this time as last - start with the positives - good location for Cabot Circus, staff are very friendly,rooms are suitably equipped and beds are comfortable and if you choose the right date the price can be right.
reviews.title: Truly disppointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012
reviews.text: This is a great value hotel in the centre of Bristol with one of the largest rooms I've seen for a budget hotel. Huge superking Quality bed and pillows, well stOcked room and great service.
reviews.title: Large rooms well equipped

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed last week at the Future Inn for two nights.
reviews.title: Good experience...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Positives: Friendly staff, free secure parking, ideal location for shoppers next to Broadmead and Cabot Circus, huge room and bed, quiet, clean and well-appointed, modern decor, free WiFi (but only in the lobby unfortunately), good price too.
reviews.title: Greasy beds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Negatives: Atmosphere in the room wasn't great as the windows cannot be opened and the air-con is loud, shower pressure is awful (though the water supply was hot and constant).
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Would definitely return if in the area again...
reviews.title: Absolutely fine.
